channel.title: Google Home on Alex Pliutau
channel.description: Recent content in Google Home on Alex Pliutau

item.title: Building Google Home Action in Go
item.description: Google Home This is a text version of this video: packagemain #10: Building Google Home Action in Go. Google Home is a voice Assistant, similar to Amazon Alexa, but working with Google services. It has a lot of built-in integrations, but what is interesting for us developes is that we can build our programs for it. Google call them Actions. We will build an Action, which will help user to find an air quality index of the city user is located in.
